item.title: Chateau Ste. Michelle
item.description: The online brand re-invention of highly regarded Ste Michelle Wine Estates hits full stride with FINE Design Group's launch of the Chateau Ste Michelle site at http://www.ste-michelle.com/. Dramatic images of the Pacific Northwest's most renowned wineries combines with functionality like events calendars, retailer locators, reviews search, interactive maps, wine browsing, to bring the Chateau Ste Michelle family of brands to life. http://www.ste-michelle.com/
